name: Green Village Hero!
description:
Green Village Hero is about a band of adventurers defending and aiding their village against the nasty bandit clan, the Ravens. Play as Taijo a young boy who joins the other guardians in protecting their home! 

The game is entirely made from Smile Game Builder and uses their art/sound assets. At the moment the game is very very short but I just wanted to put it up here, hope you enjoy it!

Control Scheme!

WSAD/Arrow Keys = Movement

Enter/Spacebar = Selecting

X = Player Menu

Esc = Exit Menu
